readable.title: 3513265399_a32e8cfd18
readable.content: A baseball player slides home in a non professional baseball game in an HDR photograph . A child is sliding into home plate and the catcher is waiting . A player is sliding into home plate with the catcher guarding it . A runner is sliding into home while the cathcer covers the plate in a softball game . A woman slides into home while the catcher tries to block .
